page.title: 13EASTER PITTENDREICH FARM
page.content:
Easter Pittendreich Farm, Elgin
Easter Pittendreich Farm belongs to Moray Estates and is rented by Mr Murdoch. The farm extends to 58.9 hectares which are used as follows:-
Grass 25.8 hectares-for silage Barley 18.6 hectares-for cattle feed Cabbage 4.8 hectares-for local market Carrots 4.8 hectares-for local market Turnips 1.3 hectares-for animals
Mr Murdoch keeps 60 beef cattle, Hereford/Charolais crosses, and between 200 and 250 pigs. The pigs are fattened until they weigh 80 kilos and are then sold for bacon.
